title: Can I combine 6 days of Shawwal to expiation for broken Oath? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Abdullah from the Philippines okay so um my question is can I combine the six days of fasting in shael and the experation fasting for a broken oath which is wah something like that the scholars stated like ibin and others that this is not permissible because fasting the experation days is mandatory and fasting the six days of shaal is a highly recommended Sunnah and both require a specific isolated ni so you cannot combine them both and hit two birds with one stone and Allah Asel Knows Best
